name: Logan
description: Telegram's sassiest group manager. Modular Telegram group management bot!

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable env variables. But, you need to understand the code to know what to set here!

TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode messages

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: a chat where your gbanlogs replied saved messages are stored

DATABASE_URL.description: well just get SQL database from elephant sql literally heroku one sucks

SUDO_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered sudo users

SUPPORT_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered support users (can gban/ungban, nothing else)

WHITELIST_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered whitelisted - they can't be banned.

DONATION_LINK.description: Optional: link where you would like to receive donations.

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks

DEL_CMDS.description: Whether to delete commands from users which don't have rights to use that command

STRICT_ANTISPAM.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Whether to allow using exclamation marks ! for commands as well as /.

BAN_STICKER.description: Which sticker to use when banning people
